#summary 3. Configuration

= Configuration =

It is important to configure the application to your location and settings.
 # Open the application
 # Click on the tab titled "Set"
  # Enter the latitude and longitude of your location
  # Select the type of notification you would like and if you would also like to be alerted to sunrise
  # Click on "Save and Apply Settings"
 # Click on the tab titled "Extra"
  # You can fill in the extra settings including your chosen calculation method
  # Click on "Save and Apply Extra"
